headline: Afterpay and Cash App Bring Pay Over Time to Anywhere Visa® is Accepted
summary: DISTRIBUTED-WORK-MODEL/OAKLAND, Calif., November 19, 2025--Today Cash App announced the upcoming pilot launch of Afterpay on Cash App Card, a new feature that allows eligible Cash App Card holders to turn their upcoming online or in-store transaction into a pay-over-time purchase anywhere Visa is accepted, through the issuance of a new Visa Debit Flex Card.

headline: Square Sets $5 Billion Stock Repurchase Plan Ahead Of Investor Day
summary: Block will authorize a new $5 billion repurchase plan for Square stock, the company said ahead of its investor day on Wednesday.

headline: Affirm: Soaring Growth At A Cheap Price
summary: Affirm benefits from surging BNPL adoption, rapid merchant expansion, and the Affirm Card's explosive growth. Read why AFRM stock is a Strong Buy.
